full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 151 of 236 1055 LC3Cmax5 Parkinson - direct. 1 227. 2 Q. Mr. Parkinson, what do we see here? 3 A. This, again, is in the lake room and you're standing on the east side looking towards the west. 4 5 MS. COMEY: I'd like to jump now please, Ms. Drescher, to Government Exhibit 235. 6 7 Q. What do we see here? 8 A. You are standing in the entrance to the foyer, the front door, which is partially opened, and the stairwell, and you're looking east standing on the first floor. 9 10 11 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, could we please pull up Government Exhibit 236. 12 13 Q. What is this? 14 A. I believe this is a view looking from the north to the south. 15 16 MS. COMEY: I'd like to now go, please, to Government Exhibit 228, please. 17 18 Q. What do we see here? 19 A. This is a view from the garden room standing at the northeast -- southeast, rather, looking towards the northwest. The room that you're actually looking in is called the lake room. 20 21 22 23 MS. COMEY: Let's go now to Government Exhibit 231, please. 24 25 Q. What do we see here? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018252
